review: Sold my xbox so I had no access to my netflix account on my television. Considered investing in a new smart tv but hated the idea of doing that when I already have a 50 inch flat screen in the living room. Grabbed the google chromecast for 35 bucks 25 minutes after getting the device it was connected and streaming netflix using my phone as a controller also my iPad. I am in love with this device, it can be the replacement for my $180 cable bill,

review: I searched high and low for something to help with "just TV" and finally found this.  It is fantastic!  I had a bit of a problem to get it to work, so I called Samsung.  I have both the Samsung Galaxy s4 and Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1.  Samsung told me that the Chromecast was NOT compatible with any of their products.  They were not exactly truthful.  After I realized what I was doing wrong.  They both work great.  If you need help with this product don't take the word of other manufacturers.  I love my Google Chromecast.
